Once they've ripened, they can't bring about another life that's ripe.
It can't bring about another life's results of retribution.
If there's another instance of [karmic] retribution, then that retribution will be brought about by another birth.
They'll also bring about other births, and the rest will bring about the rest.
The rest will in turn lead to the rest.
There should be no liberation.

source_sentence: 說一切有部順正理論卷第二十九
translation: shuoqie youbu shunzheng lun, vol. 29
